title: Renewable biomass-based aerogels: from structural design to functional regulation
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7489-7530
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS01014G, Review Article
Linfeng Chen, Xiaoxiao Yu, Mengyue Gao, Chengjian Xu, Junyan Zhang, Xinhai Zhang, Meifang Zhu, Yanhua Cheng
This review summarizes the design concepts, preparation process, regulation methods, synergistic effects of chemical compositions and microstructures, and the applications of biomass-based aerogels with different porous structures.
